GREETING.TITLE: Teams don't lose track of work with
GREETING.DESCRIPTION: See your team's plans, track progress, and discuss work in one place. With
GREETING.AS: as your work manager, you'll stay on top of everything your team's doing
GREETING.ADD: Add and assign action items. Teams know what needs to get done, which tasks are a priority, and when work is due.
GREETING.FOCUS: Focus on tasks currently at hand. Visualize each stage of work and see where things are getting stuck.
GREETING.SEE: See how work maps out over time. Manage dependent, unscheduled, and overlapping tasks, and create plans teams can count on.
GREETING.TEAM_APP: TeamApp enabled us to reduce planning time by 66% and scale from 40 to 200 campaigns per quarter.
GREETING.FLEXIBILITY: ’s flexibility and customization are the most powerful parts of it for our marketing organization.
GREETING.DAWN: Dawn Jensen — Senior Program Marketing Manager
GREETING.WE_SAVE: , we save an estimated 50 hours per week that used to be spent answering email and attending check-in meetings.
GREETING.INSTRUMENTAL: has been instrumental in enabling our team to grow by 6X this year and successfully scale our processes.
GREETING.EVERYTHING: See everything your team’s working on, all in one place.
